setUpForPlayer

private void setUpForPlayer(Player p)
Reinitialize the GUI display for the given player, to try and run from all monsters.

Parameters:
p - Player whose turn it is to run from all monsters

getChanceToGetCaught

private double getChanceToGetCaught(int runAwayBonus)
Returns the chance (0.0 - 1.0) the player has of getting caught according the the given runAwayBonus; returns 0.0 if the player will definitely escape, returns 1.0 if the player will definitely get caught.

Parameters:
runAwayBonus - the positive or negative bonus that the player has with running away
Returns:
the chance the player has of getting caught according the the given runAwayBonus

makeComputerDecisions

private void makeComputerDecisions()
Decides the best actions for computer players to perform and acts on them.

escapeAll

public void escapeAll(boolean isAllPlayers)
Sets it to automatically escape all monsters for the current player or all players.

Parameters:
isAllPlayers - when true sets all players to escape all monsters; when false only current player escapes all
